item.text: What sort of organisational structure is best suited to science? What type of organisational structure would we end up with if we applied rigorous scientific principles to the organisational basis of science?

[[SciTopia]] is a science project (originally proposed to the Welcome Trust in 2012), that looks to create a new form of [[Scientific Institution]], based on a  analysis of the activities and practice of real world science.
item.title: SciTopia

item.text: [[SciTopia]] is a project (originally proposed to the Welcome Trust in 2012), that looks to examine, and experiment with the structure of our scientific institutions.
item.title: SciTopia

item.text: Using [[Block Chain]] technology and [[Smart Contracts]] we can create new forms of institution which embody novel incentive structures and governance models. [[SciTopia]] is a project to examine these possibilities in code.

The sorts of fundamental scientific questions we seek to ask are questions such as:
  • ow should the quality of a research proposal be decided?
  • What metrics should we use when deciding on the quality of scientific practice?
  • How should we elect representatives for the scientific community?
